message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Create artifacts
steps.run:
mkdir -p path/to/artifact-A
mkdir -p path/to/artifact-B
echo "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet" > path/to/artifact-A/file-A.txt
echo "Hello world from file B" > path/to/artifact-B/file-B.txt

steps.name: Verify successful download
